Text: According to ReadMe.nfo the cracked exe "DriverGenius.exe" is missed. Pls. review the package. Thanks.
doesn't work, it ask for registering after finding obsolete drivers...

1. Install application. (Be sure you have admin rights on your system)
 2. Copy ALL files (DriverGenius.exe, FILE_ID.DIZ, register.key and
    DriverGenius.exe) from "Cracked EXE - FFF" folder and paste them 
    in to the installation folder. It is generally ;
    C:Program FilesDriver-SoftDriverGenius
